page.title: 36Area Description and Ecology 2011
page.content:
The rural area within "our square" is unlikely to change in the fore-seeable future.There are no motorways in Dorset and no planned major road improvements in this area. The large Shaftesbury and Crichel Estates form a large part of this countryside.

However, with the Olympics scheduled for 2012 and sailing events to be held in Weymouth and Portland there are Dorset roads being up-graded and a completely new road from Dorchester to Weymouth has been constructed. As "our square" is so far away, most traffic will not affect this part of East Dorset, only a few of other minor roads may be used.

Certainly, many more people are aware of the part they can play in conserving our wildlife.This area is in part of the designated Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty - (AONB) - Cranborne Chase and West Wiltshire Downs. Additionally, many more buzzards are seen as their food sources seem more reliable and deer roam freely.
Contribution by: Heather Bartlett
